reviews.review_msg: Very helpful prof and responds to emails fast. A lot to memorize for the written portion of exams. 5-6 questions out of 30 marks will be chosen randomly. You need to memorize basically word for word to get perfect. The multiple choice is easy. Exact same questions from the quizzes. Weekly quizzes can be difficult due to time restrictions.

Dayna gives great feedback on weekly assignments and she genuinely wants her students to do well. The textbook material is quite dense, but if you pay attention to her studying suggestions then it's fairly easy to do well on the midterm and final. Need to keep up with the textbook readings to do well on the weekly quizzes, but thats pretty standard

Online class. Group projects are annoying and necessary. Midterm and final, not cumulative. Based 100% on textbook. Short answer questions are given to you but must memorize about 20 (between 1-15 marks) of them to only write 5 on tests.

Awesome prof and really approachable. Midterm, final, weekly quizzes, and assignments are straightforward and really easy. study the online questions that she mentions and online quizzes for midterm and final. Easy A. We had the highest class average according to her. Definitely recommend.

Dayna is great! She is very helpful and kind. Take the course with her! The material is very interesting and she makes it a great learning experience. Would take this course again or any other course she teaches! You need to study for the midterm and final but she is fair. Very nice and approachable! Take the course with her!!
